1.title: We Begin Our Journey!
1.plot: Today we head out on a highway to begin series 2, this time taking in the new coastal drive fro Perth ending up in the Karijini national park. Join Taryn and Mark on this outback adventure.

2.title: Discover the Gravity Centre
2.plot: Today we are beginning with an amazing science and discovery centre north of Perth, where mad scientists and tour guides will entertain you with the mysteries of the universe. Think science is boring? Not here it isn't.

3.title: Quobba Blowholes and Karijini National Park
3.plot: Today we are starting at the Quobba Blowholes, a natural phenomenon 900 km from Perth, as we finally reach the spectacular Karijini national park where an eco-experiment is turning the desert into an oasis.

4.title: Karijini National Park
4.plot: It's time to get adventurous and abseil down spectacular gorges and waterways.

5.title: Karijini National Park - Part 2
5.plot: Today Mark and Taryn continue their adventure through the Karijini National Park's stunning scenery. The big fella takes Jeremy Clarkson's toilet challenge and they play with some really big toys at a mine site.

6.title: Tom Price and Rio Tinto
6.plot: Mark and Taryn visit Mount Nameless and we look at some big machines at Rio Tinto.

7.title: Millstream-Chichester National Park and Aboriginal Rock Art
7.plot: Mark and Taryn really cover the kilometres from the oasis at Millstream to the Dampier Archipelago.

8.title: Fremantle to Esperance
8.plot: Highlights from Perth to Karijini and we begin our next road trip from Fremantle to Esperance and then to Kalgoorlie.

9.title: Perth to York and the Famous Wave Rock
9.plot: Welcome to DriveWA, Taryn and Mark see some rare cars from all over the world and visit the Famous Wave Rock.

10.title: Tin Horse Highway, Yabbie Farming and Wild Flowers
10.plot: Join Mark and Taryn as they go Yabbie farming and then they'll head to Hopetoun to see the South-Western Australia wildflowers.

11.title: Traditional Owners of Esperance Western Australia
11.plot: Mark and Taryn are going to take you on a multi-restaurant food lovers adventure. In Esperance, Doc Reynolds a traditional owner takes us on an insiders tour of his beautiful town.

12.title: Esperance - The Wildlife
12.plot: Part two of our Esperance adventure. Traditional owner Doc Reynolds takes us on a wildlife tour of the South-West Australian town Esperance. Taryn comes across some unique jewellery and the big fella tries to lose a finger at the local wild life park.

13.title: The World Longest Golf Course and Lake Ballard
13.plot: Mark and Taryn start off at Kalgoorlie and end up at Lake Ballard to see Antony Gormley's sculptures after playing on the world's largest golf course.

14.title: Mark Goes Back to Esperance
14.plot: In part three of our Esperance adventure, Doc Reynolds takes Mark to see some of Western Australia's most beautiful waterways.

15.title: Hunting and Finding Water with Doc Reynolds
15.plot: Part four of our Esperance adventure. Taryn, Mark and Doc Reynolds explore the food and the stories of the traditional owners and how the landscapes and islands of Esperance came about.

16.title: Aboriginal Art, Woody Island and Good-Bye Doc
16.plot: Welcome to part five and our final chapter in our Esperance adventure. Mark and Doc visit the Woody Island getaway with spectacular scenery, amazing dolphins and we learn all about how Aboriginal art is made.

17.title: The Golden Quest Trail
17.plot: Part two of the amazing Antony Gormley statues. We meet who's involved in creating them and learn where's best to go camping along the Golden Quest Trail.

18.title: The Golden Quest Trail (Cont.) and the Kalgoorlie Goldrush
18.plot: Mark and Tanya continue along The Golden Quest Trail, starting at the Great Beyond and looking at the fascinating history of the Kalgoorlie gold rush.

19.title: The Old and New Ways of Mining for Gold
19.plot: Mark and Taryn look at the old and new ways of mining for gold. They discover just how much things have changed with technology.

20.title: Beer, Two-Up and C.Y. O'Connor
20.plot: In our exciting final episode of DriveWA season two, Taryn and Mark check out the local beer and play Two-Up in Kalgoorlie. They discover more of the history of C.Y. O'Connor and many other things that shaped Australia's history.

imdb.plot outline: Drive WA is a series all about getting on the road to discover one of the worlds most amazing regions. Tune in for some spectacular landscapes, amazing history and sensational wild life footage, you are going to see the best of Western Australia,
imdb.title: Drive WA
plot: _Drive WA_ (qv) is a series all about getting on the road to discover one of the worlds most amazing regions. Tune in for some spectacular landscapes, amazing history and sensational wild life footage, you are going to see the best of Western Australia,
